news.h: Signet Capital Group Expands Funding Programs
news.d: Signet expanded its funding offerings including revenue-based financing, MCA, invoice factoring, and SBA loans with approvals in under two hours.

news.h: Sky Bridge Acquired by Revenued
news.d: Sky Bridge Business Funding was acquired by Revenued in 2020 and its services are now integrated into Revenued's platform.

news.h: Acclivity Financial Continues SBA Lending Expansion
news.d: As a Citizens Bank subsidiary, Acclivity became one of the top SBA lenders nationally, with loans ranging from $350K to $10M through SBA 7(a) and USDA programs.

news.h: Acclivity Financial Grows to 60 Employees
news.d: Acclivity Financial expanded to approximately 60 employees across North America, serving small rural businesses nationwide.

news.h: Amerisource Celebrates 40th Anniversary with $2.1B Milestone
news.d: Amerisource Business Capital celebrated 40 years of empowering middle market lending, having facilitated over $2.1 billion in loans.

news.h: Amerisource Closes $30M ABL Facility for Infrastructure Company
news.d: Amerisource closed a $30M asset-based lending facility for a Southwest-based midstream energy infrastructure company.

news.h: Amerisource Provides $2.5M ABL Facility for Texas Distributor
news.d: Amerisource closed a $2.5 million ABL facility for a Texas-based industrial supplies distribution company.

news.h: Bluegrass Lending Revolutionizes Business Funding
news.d: Bluegrass Lending announced its commitment to lightning-fast capital delivery in as little as 24 hours with competitive rates.

news.h: Bluegrass Lending Expands Team and Operations
news.d: The company expanded its team and operations across Arizona and Kentucky as it continued rapid growth.

news.h: C6 Capital Holdings Expands Infrastructure Investments
news.d: C6 Capital continues deploying capital through C6 Infrastructure Partners, a sustainable energy fund advancing the energy transition.

news.h: CapFront CEO Accepted into Forbes Business Council
news.d: Zack Fiddle was accepted into the Forbes Business Council, recognizing CapFront's growth as a leading SMB funding marketplace.

news.h: Creative Capital Solutions Continues SME Lending Growth
news.d: Creative Capital Solutions serves over 10,000 business clients with working capital advances, lines of credit, and asset-based loans with 24-48 hour funding.

news.h: Ein Cap Continues Merchant Cash Advance Operations
news.d: Ein Cap maintains its focus as a NYC-based MCA provider serving small businesses across America.

news.h: Envision Capital Group Expands Commercial Finance Department
news.d: Envision added Bruce Follese to head the newly formed commercial finance origination department.

news.h: Envision Capital Group Partners with Chefs' Toys
news.d: Envision partnered with Chefs' Toys, a restaurant equipment provider, expanding its vendor finance program.

news.h: Allen Snelling Promoted to President of Financial Pacific Leasing
news.d: Umpqua Bank subsidiary Financial Pacific Leasing promoted Allen Snelling to President, overseeing the $1.7B portfolio.

news.h: LEAF Capital Returns with $792.6M Asset-Backed Securities
news.d: Financial Pacific Leasing's parent Columbia Banking System continues to grow its equipment financing division with major securitizations.

news.h: J D Factors Celebrates 30 Years of Factoring in Canada
news.d: J D Factors celebrated three decades of factoring services across Canada with offices in Mississauga, Montreal, and Calgary.

news.h: LEAF Issues $550M in Asset-Backed Securities
news.d: LEAF Commercial Capital issued $550M in asset-backed notes through M&T Equipment as the company continues strong securitization activity.

news.h: Crit DeMent Retires as LEAF Chairman
news.d: Longtime CEO and co-founder Crit DeMent retired from his position as LEAF Chairman after leading the company since 2001.

news.h: LEAF Sponsors $792.6M Securitization Deal
news.d: LEAF Capital Funding sponsored a $792.6 million asset-backed securities issuance managed by Atlas SP Securities, BofA, and JPMorgan.

news.h: LendingPoint Announces Strategic Capital Raise
news.d: LendingPoint announced a new Series C capital raise to accelerate growth in 2026, building on $865M revenue in 2024.

news.h: LendingPoint Revenue Hits $865M with 300K Customers
news.d: LendingPoint grew revenue to $865.3M in 2024, up from $655M in 2023, serving 300,000 customers with AI-driven lending.

news.h: Maxim Commercial Capital Grew Team by 21% in 2025
news.d: Maxim expanded its executive and operating teams by 21% with plans to deploy new credit guidelines in early 2026.

news.h: Maxim Reports 150% Increase in Q1 2025 Funding Volume
news.d: Maxim exceeded expectations with 150% increase in funding volume, approving 80% of applications and funding in 37 states.

news.h: Maxim Delivers Creative Financing Solutions in Q3 2025
news.d: Maxim continued filling the capital void for small and mid-sized businesses with creative financing solutions through heavy equipment verticals.

news.h: Merchant Source Continues MCA Operations Since 2008
news.d: Merchant Source maintains its position as a seasoned MCA provider with thousands of small business clients funded since 2008.

news.h: Pathway Lending Launches $30M Housing Fund
news.d: Pathway launched the Pathway Housing Fund with $30M committed to preserve affordable housing in Tennessee communities.

news.h: Pathway Lending Funds $61.3M in Loan Capital in 2024
news.d: Pathway funded $61.3M in loan capital and provided 15,000 hours of coaching to 2,800 entrepreneurs in 2024.

news.h: Hank Helton Elected Chair of CDFI Coalition
news.d: Pathway Lending's EVP Hank Helton was elected Chair of the national CDFI Coalition Board of Directors.

news.h: Quick Capital Funding Maintains BBB Accreditation
news.d: Quick Capital Funding continues as a BBB-accredited small business lender since 2015, providing fast working capital solutions.

news.h: RidgeStone Capital Expands Equipment Financing Operations
news.d: RidgeStone Capital continues helping business owners secure financing for equipment, expansion, inventory, and working capital.

news.h: Trio Capital Announces Scardigli as President
news.d: Mark Scardigli joined Trio Capital as President, bringing 30+ years of equipment finance experience from Marlin Capital Solutions.

news.h: Trio Capital Welcomes Dan Furfari as VP of Sales
news.d: Trio Capital hired Dan Furfari as VP of Sales to drive strategic development with equipment manufacturers and resellers nationwide.

news.h: Accord Business Funding Featured on deBanked
news.d: Accord Business Funding was profiled for generating deal flow in the heartland, operating from Mississippi and beyond.

news.h: One Park Financial Wins 8th Great Place to Work Certification
news.d: One Park Financial received its 8th Great Place to Work certification, reinforcing its reputation as a top employer in Miami.

news.h: One Park Financial Ranked 3rd in Sun Sentinel Top Workplaces
news.d: One Park Financial achieved 3rd place and won a Communication Award in the 2025 Sun Sentinel Top Workplaces.

news.h: Gibraltar Provides $12.5M to Consumer Goods Company
news.d: Gibraltar Business Capital provided a $12.5M ABL facility to Starco Brands to support growth supply chain and inventory needs.

news.h: Formetco Renews $15M Credit Facility with Gibraltar
news.d: Formetco secured a $15M revolving credit facility renewal with Gibraltar Business Capital to facilitate growth plans.

news.h: 360 Payments Processes $3B+ Annually Across 5,000 Businesses
news.d: 360 Payments grew to process over $3 billion in annual credit card transactions, servicing 5,000+ businesses in US and Canada.

news.h: 360 Payments Opens Second Office
news.d: The Silicon Valley-based fintech expanded its physical footprint by opening a second office location.

news.h: Bizcap Acquires 8fig
news.d: UK-based business lender Bizcap acquired 8fig, which retains independence under its existing brand and leadership after deploying $500M+ to ecommerce sellers.

news.h: 8fig Raises $140M Series B Funding
news.d: 8fig closed a $140M Series B led by Koch Disruptive Technologies, bringing total funding to $196.5M for its ecommerce funding platform.

news.h: Advance Funds Network Continues B2B Financing Growth
news.d: Advance Funds Network continues to expand its B2B financing solutions with a focus on smart financing for small businesses.

news.h: American Stimulus Funding Continues SMB Capital Operations
news.d: American Stimulus Funding maintains its position as a leading short-term working capital provider for small and medium businesses nationwide.

news.h: Ascendus Partners with LIIF for Child Care Capital Program
news.d: Ascendus partnered with LIIF and Working Solutions CDFI to launch a new Family Child Care Capital Access Initiative in California.

news.h: Ascendus Deploys $50.2M to 1,309 Business Owners in 2024
news.d: Ascendus deployed $50.2M in capital and delivered 11,000+ hours of coaching to small business owners in 2024.

news.h: Enova Reports 25% Revenue Increase, Strong SMB Growth
news.d: Enova International reported 25% revenue increase and 63% rise in adjusted EPS, driven by strong small business lending originations.

news.h: Enova Releases Q4 2025 Small Business Cash Flow Trend Report
news.d: Enova's small business segment showed continued resilience heading into 2026, with growing adoption of digital lending platforms.

news.h: CapFlow Launches FactorLOC Product
news.d: CapFlow launched FactorLOC, a new product bridging traditional invoice factoring and lines of credit with flexible advance rates of 40-60%.

news.h: CapFlow Launches FactorOne Spot-Factoring Solution
news.d: CapFlow introduced FactorOne, a fast and flexible spot-factoring solution for single invoice financing.

news.h: Clearco Triples Funding Deployed in 2024
news.d: Clearco tripled the dollar amount of capital advances in 2024 and is on track to increase an additional 50% in 2025 under new CEO Andrew Curtis.

news.h: Clearco Back in Growth Mode After Restructuring
news.d: After leadership changes and layoffs, Clearco returned to growth mode with a new Toronto office and expanded Canadian operations.

news.h: Coast Funding Partners with Doctor Multimedia
news.d: Coast Funding entered a strategic partnership with Doctor Multimedia to expand its healthcare and medical financing vertical.

news.h: Coast Funding Grows Alternative Financing Portfolio
news.d: Founded in 2020, Coast Funding expanded its product offerings including MCA, equipment financing, and working capital in San Diego.
